reviews.text: If you go to Tokyo there are probably better hotels but not for those of us with vertigo. If you don't like being on the 30th floor of some skyscraper then this is the Tokyo hotel for you. The highest floor possible is the 10th and the majority are lower. It is also very good if you want to get outside for some fresh air as it has an outdoor (as well as indoor) pool and a small garden area. This particularly suits those staying for longer periods and those with small children who need a break from sight seeing all day.
reviews.title: Good for those with vertigo!

reviews.text: Overall it is a good hotel although a little dated now in its decor but still immaculate. Most impressive was the service. Nothing was too much trouble and room service was so fast it was quite amazing.
reviews.title: Fantastic Room and Amenities

reviews.text: We reserved a triple room and it came with 3 super single beds and were surprised that we still had room to move around. Room was clean. The bathroom is spacious and amenities provided were fantastic.
reviews.title: Great hotel, very near Disneyland!!!
